channel.title: Windows XP VM within WHONIX Workstation
channel.description: So basically I have my host that is hosting the whonix gateway and workstation. In my workstation, I installed virtual box once more and have a Windows XP O/S installed. Is it possible for my Windows XP's connection to not be tor? Or am I just being retarded and should just install Windows XP on my host rather than whonix workstation?

item.title: Windows XP VM within WHONIX Workstation
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Possible. See documentation:

Whonix

Other Operating Systems

Anonymize any Operating System! Your operating system tunneled through the Tor Anonymity Network! Create your Custom-Whonix-Workstation!

Read full topic
item.source: Windows XP VM within WHONIX Workstation
